name: Tap It!
description:
In 2019, I decided to commit to the goal of finishing a game each month. This is the phone-friendly version of my earlier game, Tap It!. I'd just finished  Type It!+, and was in desperate need of something else to pad out my games, so here's Tap It!.

This is a test of your mobile gesture ability. Perform the touch action that appear on screen. If the time runs out before you perform the action, or you perform the wrong action, you lose. Swipe to try again. Good luck.
